short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn the japanese alphabets by gradually substituting latin letters

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One of the challanges of learning Japanese is to understand the alphabets effortlessly.

This Add-on will let you become familiar with the Hiragana while reading in a language you understand, making the transition somewhat smoother than having to cram and remember. For some languages, like Norwegian, the sounds will be very similar.

Features included in this version (2.0):

Hiragana
Katakana
Include groups by base character
Enable/Disable


Future implementations:
Your suggestion!
